message:
Cave Story

Or get the PC version for free and then decide if you want the WiiWare version.

Any recommendations for great games I can download from the Wii Store?

At the moment I have Paper Mario 64, World of Goo, Bubble Bobble.
Also, if you're a Bubble Bobble fan... the arcade version is awesome.
LostWinds 1 & 2.  Definitely among the top original content on WiiWare.
Excite Bike is actually good (the WiiWare version) and I'd suggest Contra Rebirth. Genuchi and I finished the Nightmare mode right after doing normal. Yes, we're GODS!
Lastly - Sin and Punishment. Play that with a friend and co-op to experience a shooter/platformer like never before. Genuchi and I finished that too. Last last boss is out of this world...
Thanks guys. I will look up these.
